channel.title: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org
channel.description:
Hi,
I Have tried making a webclient for my server at rs-ps,org
I have been attempting this, for at least 2 hours now,but still no luck.
i run the server and it seems to be on, but whenever i go to make the webclient, it comes up with an error message saying: "* Your server is currently offline, please make sure your server is online before you try to create a webclient."
I Was wondering if anyone knows what to do and how i can fix this :)
Thanks, Greenie

item.title: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org
item.dc:creator: @Greenie225 Greenie225
item.description:
@Greenie225 wrote:

i have a Netgear DG834G Router, and i cant get it to portforward… Any Ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org

item.title: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

make sure if ur server connects to one ip make sure its the ip of the computer u got ur server running from not 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org

item.title: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org
item.dc:creator: @Dean1 Dean.
item.description:
@Dean1 wrote:

Did you even portforward it? It’s probably working for you because your using the local host: 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0.
Go to http://canyouseeme.org/ and if it says Cannot find you, that means you didn’t portforward correctly.

For the portforwarding guide go to the tutorials section in RS2 server emulation board.

Read full topic
item.source: It Says My Server Is Offline When I'm Trying To Make a Webclient at rs-ps,org
